caption: ✨ Ready to level up your daily routine? 🚀 Join me as I share my go-to tips for balancing work and wellness! 🧘‍♀️💼 Whether you're looking for productivity hacks or self-care inspiration, this video has something for everyone. Hit that play button and let’s thrive together! 💪💖 What’s your favorite way to find balance? Share in the comments! 👇 #WorkLifeBalance #WellnessJourney

avatar_data.prompt: A realistic portrait photo of a 25-35 year old person, friendly, professional, engaging personality, professional headshot quality, studio lighting, high resolution, photorealistic, detailed facial features, natural expression, suitable for social media profile, modern style

media_prompt: A lifestyle social media post image, featuring the same person from the avatar, related to: ✨ Ready to level up your daily routine? 🚀 Join me as I share my go-to tips for balancing work and we, high quality, professional, Instagram-worthy, bright and engaging, modern aesthetic
